<!-- Check all that apply -->
- [ ] `auto/security` - Security fix or improvement
- [ ] `auto/perf` - Performance optimization

- [ ] Bugfix - Bug fix
- [ ] Refactor - Code refactoring
- [ ] Other - Please describe

<!-- Pre-merge checklist -->
